Name: Spooky Mahjong
About the game: Spooky mahjong - Tremble - on the eve of Halloween, every evil spirits get out to freedom to ... play connect mahjong with you! Leave your fears and doubts behind and enjoy an enjoyable mahjong connect style puzzle! Dark forces have bewitched this game, making it 'endless' in fact, play as much as you want and conquer level after level in this endless adventure. Peculiarities: - Nice graphics - Nice soundtrack
